attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: I recently read that the prime minister would like to make A-levels compulsory but I am very much against this. Pupils should have the right to make that decision for themselves, as independant human beings

rejection.details: Can you make it clear in the title you're referring to school education
reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
